tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Srimanth was extremely good in treating my father who was diagnosed with clear cell chondrosarcoma. We are grateful for his friendly attitude and for his patience level. Sir helped us in making the whole treatment procedure comfortable for my father. The keen observation and the responsibility he exhibited over my father was tremendously helpful. We are extremely thankful for Srimanth sir for his humbleness, time to time check ups, follow ups and for being available to us at any time of requirement. Our society needs many more doctors like Dr.Srimanth.B.S....Thank you sooo much sir!!

I am diagnosed with tumor treatment relates L1 & L3 sarcoma(cancer)and gone through major surgery( cancer )at Manipal hospital ,HAL road,Bengaluru. Overall it has been a comforting experience for us. Dr.Srimanth and his supporting staffs are very supportive and helped lot throughout the hospital visit and during the hospitalization. Thanks to Dr.Srimanth his support , encouragement and good treatmen

**** ************ ****** *** ********* ********* *** ***** *** I was serving in Indian Army i was operated last year sept 2017 in my Ischium and Acetabulum bone tumour, my tumour was removed successfully and without any wound infection, now I am successfully walking without any problem and support. 
                                                             Thank u Doctor
